description.en: IFX24 token is the primary utility token of IFX24 exchange. Users will soon be able to stake IFX24 token and earn fees collected by IFX24 exchange in return for helping secure components of our decentralized architecture. IFX24 token also incentivizes platform adoption and trading volume through IFX24 trading rewards which are automatically distributed to users’ wallets based on their monthly trading volume.
